Given the observed state of the system at \\( u(x, T) \\), is it possible to determine exactly whether \\( F(u) \\), \\( G(u) \\), or both were applied during the evolution from \\( u(x, 0) \\) to \\( u(x, T) \\), solely based on \\( u(x, T) \\)?

The possible combinations and their effects make it implausible to uniquely identify the interventions based solely on the final state.
